metadata.Title: CVE-2015-8860 on Ubuntu 18.04 LTS (bionic) - medium
metadata.Description:
The tar package before 2.0.0 for Node.js allows remote attackers to writeto arbitrary files via a symlink attack in an archive.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2015-8860` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

node-tar - 2.2.1-1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: node-tar package in bionic, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '2.2.1-1').
